entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
